DESCRIPTION: #yStance: While in #yNightmare #yStance, lose #b1 #ySanity when you play a card, and draw #b2 cards when you play a #yLunacy. NL Exit #yNightmare #yStance at the end of your turn.
While you have negative #ySanity, lose #b1 at the start of each turn. NL For every #b5 #ySanity you lose, add a #yLunacy to your hand, then gain #b5 #ySanity.
